title: Falling for You
description:
He's off-limits, continually underestimates me, and yet… I can't ignore the attraction between us.
CallieWhen I landed my dream job, I didn’t realize I’d be working with the one guy I’ve always avoided.Jonah. Caught off guard with a career-ending injury; he is the life and soul of every party, a likable, sociable guy on all accounts. His future relies on the success of the sports complex I’ve been hired to manage. But…he doubts my capabilities from the get-go. I’m tired of being underestimated, of having my capabilities judged by just my pretty face. This is my opportunity to prove everyone wrong, including Jonah. I just never expected to fall for him, or to learn that Jonah isn’t the man he pretends to be.
author: Lea Coll
